com.konakartadmin.app

Class AdminImageOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakartadmin.app.AdminImageOptions

  • public class AdminImageOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The AdminImageOptions is used to define the options for image APIs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int id
      The id (use the productId for operations on products, use manufacturerId for operations on manufacturers)

      The type of object for the image operation.
      private java.lang.String targetFilename
      Only used for removal of images.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private int id
        The id (use the productId for operations on products, use manufacturerId for operations on manufacturers)

      • sourceFullFilename

        private java.lang.String sourceFullFilename
        Full filename of the source image. Must be accessible to the Admin Engine.

      • targetFilename

        private java.lang.String targetFilename
        Only used for removal of images.

        Filename (or part of) of the image to operate on. If this value is specified as "*" then all images associated with the object (identified by id) will be deleted. This value should not include the path but only the file name (or part of) itself. It is used for searching for images so is used as a pattern for matching.

      • subject

        private int subject
        The type of object for the image operation. e.g. add or remove image for product, category or manufacturer. This must be set.
        • IMG_PRODUCT = product (in which case the id must be the productId)
        • IMG_MANUFACTURER = manufacturer (in which case the id must be the manufacturerId)
        • IMG_CATEGORY = category (in which case the id must be the categoryId)
